title: Perform Virtual Screening of Compounds
description: A computational chemist wants to perform a virtual screen of a large compound library against a protein target structure.

tasks.description: Prepare the 3D structure of the target protein for docking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent loads the protein structure and prepares it by adding hydrogens and assigning charges.

tasks.description: Prepare the library of millions of compounds for screening.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the compound library to generate 3D conformations for each molecule.
Agent runs the docking program, which calculates a binding score for each compound.

tasks.description: Analyze the results and select the top-scoring compounds for purchase and in vitro testing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sorts the results by score and selects the top 1000 compounds for follow-up.
